price: (8) There is no deity except Him; He gives life and causes death. [He is] your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers.
arabic: لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحۡيِۦ وَيُمِيتُۖ رَبُّكُمۡ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: lā ilāha illā huwa yuḥ'yī wayumītu rabbukum warabbu ābāikumu al-awalīna
